title: Dez Bryant, Lakers, Aaron Rodgers, & rule changes
itunes:title: Dez Bryant, Lakers, Aaron Rodgers, & rule changes
description:
Colin explains why he's done talking about FA WR Dez Bryant, why the Los Angeles Lakers will have a better record than some people think, what ails Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers, and why people should accept new rule changes in sports. Guests include Nick Wright, Rob Parker, Joel Klatt, and Bryan Cox.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
